title: Accessible Software and Web Design
ziele:
Students develop

- basic awareness and understanding of the importance of web and software accessibility

- knowledge about guidelines, techniques and tools for implementation of accessibility

- practical skills in evaluating accessibility of software and web pages/applications

- practical skills in development and design and development
lehrinhalte:
- Potential and importance of ICT for people with disabilities and the ageing population

- Assistive Technologies and requirements towards implementation of systems and their HCI related to requirements of vision, hearing, motoric, cognitive and psychological disabilities

- Knowledge and skills in applying web accessibility guidelines, techniques, tools and standards of accessible web and software engineering

- Practical examples of of evaluating and (re)designing for accessibility

- Knowledge on how to best implement software and web accessibility into software engineering processes
beurteilung: Participation, contribution, exam and quality of practical examples
methoden: Combination of presentation, discussion and practice
literatur:
- www.w3c.org/wai

- handout

- up to date literature
